text1:
User-guided segmentation

Step 1: Draw a bounding box around the ROI.

Step 2: Draw the ROI's outline and fill it in.

Step 3: The segmented image will be saved to the same directory as the input image.

Step 4: Clear the selection and go back to Step 1.
text4:
t-SNE plot of source domain embeddings

Step 1: Choose a set of directories containing embeddings to be plotted.

Step 2: A t-SNE plot of embeddings will be created.
